articles.headline: LFO's 'Summer Girls' tops billboard charts
articles.byline: By MICHAEL J. FOX and ALEX P. KEATON
articles.description: New Kids on the Block have nothing on the hit-making pop sensation LFO, whose single 'Summer Girls' has topped the charts this week.

articles.headline: Brightly-colored muchkins attack R&B girl group
articles.byline: By THE TELETUBBIES and DESTINY'S CHILD
articles.description: Members of superstar R&B group Destiny's Child were attacked early Friday  by a group of pink and blue circular creatures known as 'Teletubbies,' Beverly Hills police said.

articles.headline: 'Don't ask, don't tell' bans military from openly liking pop boybands
articles.byline: By BILL CLINTON and THE BACKSTREEET BOYS
articles.description: Pres. Clinton signed a sweeping new measure late Thursday to protect the sanctity of the nation's armed services by banning all pop boybands from being played by active duty members.
